articles.content: On Sunday the Kansas City Chiefs face the Arizona Cardinals According to DraftKings Sportsbook, Kansas City is favored to win by six points. We welcome Seth Cox of Revenge of the Birds our sister SBN… [+3145 chars]

articles.author: Zach Dean
articles.title: UCF Torched After Embarrassing Louisville Loss, Equally Petty Tweet - OutKick
articles.description: UCF - the 2017 National Champs - got embarrassed by Louisville, torched on twitter and then posted a hilariously petty tweet.
articles.content:
On a night the ESPN camera panned over the always-funny “2017 National Champions” banner, UCF got embarrassed by a terrible Louisville team.
The Knights, who were 6.5-point favorite, led 14-7 at the… [+2248 chars]
